name: wifi-serviceworker
description: A project to meet the 'lighthouse audit test' of [a URL that responds with a 200 when offline](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/lighthouse/audits/http-200-when-offline) and also gives some kind of visual responsive cue to the user that that would seem as if they are in fact online.
author: Emily Reese <emilyreese@fastmail.com>
